Description.Text: Located in Cassowary, Mai Tai Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Port Douglas. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Mai Tai Resort. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access – wireless, private pool, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Discover all Port Douglas has to offer by making Mai Tai Resort your base.
